raw_body: BOLLING – BERNADETTE (BERNIE) PRISICILLA (nee FERNANDO). At Rest with Jesus. Beloved wife of late Reggie Bolling,​ step mother of Derrick,​ daughter of the late Michael and late Beatrice Fernando,​ loving sister of late Carryl,​ late Aleric,​ Trisette,​ late Michael,​ Wivina,​ Charmaine,​ Bellamin,​ Firmin and Petronella,​ fond aunt to many nieces and nephews. Cortege leaves A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour at 11.00 a.m. on Thursday,​ 30th November for Cremation at General Cemetery Borella at 11.30 a.m. (New Crematorium).078208
